name: seng-log
description: Boilerplate and example project for all Seng projects

scripts.clean:npm: shx rm -rf lib npm index.js index.d.ts
scripts.compile:npm: npm run clean:npm && tsc -p ./ -d --outDir ./npm && shx mv "./npm/*" ./ && shx rm -rf ./npm

scriptsComment.test: Placeholder for all types of tests
scriptsComment.test:unit: Runs unit tests with Karma in PhantomJS
scriptsComment.validate: Runs all scripts that validate if the contents of this repos is correct
scriptsComment.validate:coverage: Checks if the code coverage results are above a defined minimun
scriptsComment.lint: Placeholder for all types if linting checks
scriptsComment.lint:ts: Lints the source files using tslint
scriptsComment.clean: Placeholder for all clean tasks, resets the checkout to a clean state
scriptsComment.compile: Placeholder for all tasks that compile code
scriptsComment.compile:dev: Compiles browser dist bundle with webpack
scriptsComment.compile:npm: Compiles the code for npm. The output needs to end up in the current directory, but if we use that as outputPath in tsconfig.json it disables file-globbing for the includes array. That's why we are outputting it in a npm folder, and then moving it the this folder.
scriptsComment.compile:dist:typescript:es6: Compiles typescript to es6 code in the dist folder
scriptsComment.compile:dist:webpack: Compiles all dist bundles with webpack
scriptsComment.generate: Placeholder for all scripts that generate something (code, test, doc, etc)
scriptsComment.build:dev: Prepares server for browser testing, by default at: localhost:8080
scriptsComment.build:npm: Prepares the checkout for an npm publish
scriptsComment.build:dist: Prepares the checkout for travis deployments to github and s3
